The Quranic researcher said: For the tyrants, that is, the one who is counted in the tyrant, is attached to a guarantee, either an either a source of greeting, that is: a person to the tyrants, or the state of the people, or the state of the one who said: He was presented to him to be a denial, and if he was delayed, he would have a qualification for him; That is: I was back and wandering, as they were returning to him and they were not referred, and it was permissible to be another news to “I was” or attached to “or stuck” And it was said: The meaning of their enemies is a number of them from their saying: I was observed for him; That is: I domesticated and rewarded him with good or evil and “pain”."Meteorology." And "for the tyrants" is attached to it or a state of it on some preceding interpretations in being a whip, and he contemplated.Abu Omar, Al -Muqtari and Ibn Ya`mar read: “Hell” with the opening of the gossip with the appreciation of the lameness of the righteousness of the righteousness of the time of the one who was the one who is the one who was the one who was the one who is the one who is the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was Permanent, and it is followed by that it is then that it will be: “that the righteous” also with openness and is given to what is here; Because they are all, the accumulation is fulfilled by the residence of the penalty, except that it is said: the compassion is left to sign to the resignation of each of the two parts in the summons of the resurrection of the time.Because in this, the parties are completed, and as for the same residence, it is sufficient to explain it to what was mentioned on that if if it was intended, then it was not a good way This talk is originally.
